images.description: Minimalist workspace with laptop and coffee, high key lighting.
Professional using smartphone with city view, conveying mobility.
Clean wooden desk setup, conveying organization.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use 'Inter' for headings. Use 'Chivo'.
DO NOT use generic blue for primary actions. Use 'Deep Forest Green'.
DO NOT center text by default. Left align for readability.
Use 'recharts' or 'shadcn/ui charts' for data visualization.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast (APCA/WCAG AA).
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-precision finance tool. The code must be as clean as the design. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. Implement the 'Bento' grid for the dashboard. Ensure the 'Deep Forest' green is the dominant brand color, used sparingly for impact, not flooding the screen.
